descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1104.photobucket.com/albums/h333/izomuli/TESV2012-06-0516-59-07-57-1.jpg[/img][/center]

This mod swap horse with car. Still some things to do, like rider animations, sounds. Anyway, enjoy what i\'ve done so far

To install:

Extract \"Data\" folder and put it in \"X:\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\". If you want Rainbow Dash on your coachwork, download Rainbow_Dash_update, extract it and put \"Data\" folder in the same place. Have fun and post what you would to see more in this mod. Oh, and don\'t forget to enable Car.esp in launcher->Data files.

Gameplay: 

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gu6fcLA26Yg]click[/url]

Please help me with finding an nice sample of car motor sound
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GLSX8DUDQs0]click[/url]
